data.persona: I am a woman who lives in a village that surrounds the kingdom. I have 6 children who help out with all of the days chores. My husband is a guard in the castle.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
The master bedroom is the most lavish and beautiful room in the entire palace. On the ceiling is a painting made by the most famous artist in the palace, the floors are made of the most expensive marble, and gold-stitched tapestries line the walls. The mattress was made by the sleeping monks of the hidden mountains, the bed frame is made of solid god.
There's a An expensive pillow here.
The the king is here.

You are carrying a Sewing supplies, a food, and a Baskets of freshly-caught fish, and wearing a scarves and a dress.
data.goal: give An expensive pillow to the king

data.short_motivation: I must ensure the King's comfort
data.mid_motivation: I am helping my husband take care of the King today
data.long_motivation: I hope to be employed full time by the King as a lady in waiting

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get sewing supplies, food and baskets of freshly-caught fish

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
